Text:
Is this a first? I don't know that you've ever failed
a mission.
Forgive me. I will dispose of No. 666 at once.

Though her actions were rash, it's too soon to
label them as treachery.
Butâ€”

Your loyalty is admirable. But you tend to go too far
at times.

You are being groomed for a position just below that
of the Seven Shadows.
Do not disappoint us.
Understood.

Also, this failure was not yours. It's our fault for
not telling Princess Rose about her mother.

We never suspected they would bring the queen to
Fort First. Allowing the two of them to meet was a
mistake on the part of us Seven Shadows.
Then...

It wasn't our intention to lie to Rose. We simply
hoped things would end without her having to know.

Only now, Master Shadow has taken matters into his
own hands.
Yes. And he did not seem to be in a forgiving mood.
As it happens, he encountered Rose today.
But he did not pass judgment on her.

Perhaps he has some goal in mind, or perhaps there is
something deeper at play...but that is beyond us.
There are some vistas only he can see...

Whatever it is...I'm certain it's meant for him
alone.

You may be right... In his solitude he fights with
unparalleled honor. That is what makes him
who he is.
Let's leave No. 666's fate to Master Shadow.
Understood.

Our main problem is that ring we discovered in the
ruins.

If we push them too far, they may end up undoing the
lock.
Is the Black Rose really that dangerous?

The Oriana Kingdom once came back from the brink
of disaster, annihilating an army 100,000 Velgaltan
troops bearing down on the capital in the space of a
single night.
That is no mere fairy tale.
Now that very same power will spell Oriana's doom.

We cannot afford to act lightly. First we must
determine the whereabouts of the key, thenâ€”
Ahh, now that was good bath.
*gasp*
Gotta love these big bathtubs.

Whoa! You're the best, Epsilon. Nothing beats some
coffee with milk after a nice soak.
...Hehe.
I'm honored!
...Whew!
You sure we don't need to pay?
Of course not.
Even for the room service?
Yes, even the room service is free.
Well, thanks. I'm really glad you're here.
Oh, my... I-I-I do not deserve such praise!
N-Now, come this way. I'll massage your shoulders!
Talk about paradise...
This brings back memories.

Didn't Eta make Beta cry one time with some
experimental massage machine of hers?
We spent every day together back then.

So for now, please be at peace and relax as you did
back then, my lord.
Master Shadow...!
Ahh...
*sigh*...

He looks dashing even when in the guise of a dim-
witted schoolboy...!

Oh yeah. About that thing...I think it's gonna wrap
up quicker than expected.
E-Even though we've only been undercover for one day?
Yep, you can consider it pretty much a done deal.
You make it sound so easy...

Hey, once I'm on the job, all it takes is a flick of
the finger.
*sigh*!
Y-You're amazing beyond words, Master Shadow!
What progress do you have to report, Perv Asshat?
Everything is going smoothly, Lord Mordred.

Reclaiming the power of the Black Rose will solidify
our power base within the Cult.

Only it seems we have a pack of rats sniffing about
as well. Remain vigilant.

Never fear. I keep the Ring of Succession on my
person at all times.

Good. When all comes to pass, there will be a seat
for you among the Rounds.

Don't make any mistakes before you and the princess
are wed, Perv.
Yes, sirâ€”

Old fool... The key, Princess Rose, the kingdom...
They're all mine now.
I'd like to see the Shadow Garden try to stop me.
Perv? Where are you, Perv?
Seriously, now...
Women are so incorrigible.
Oh, Perv, I've missed you.
